description.value:
With extensive training, you have begun to sense the faint psychic trails left behind by intelligent and psychic creatures. You can use this newfound sensitivity to track prey with your psychic powers.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#telepathy]{Telepathy} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.QmSOsPFazgFH1kKu]{limited telepathy} species trait.

Benefit: You gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#follow-tracks]{track} intelligent or psychic creatures and can use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.HXcmgteT2OegqFrB]{Mysticism} in place of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} for tracking.

modifiers.name: Psychic Stalking
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 species bonus to track intelligent or psychic creatures and can use Mysticism in place of Survival for tracking.

modifiers.name: Psychic Stalking
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 species bonus to track intelligent or psychic creatures and can use Mysticism in place of Survival for tracking.
